faqs.question: How does the AI book creation process work?
faqs.answer:
Creating your personalized children's book is simple and takes just a few minutes:

  1. Choose Your Story: Browse our collection of story themes and select one that fits your child's interests and age.
  2. Upload a Photo: Upload a clear, well-lit photo of your child. Our AI uses this to create a consistent character throughout the book.
  3. Customize Details: Add your child's name, select preferences, and personalize the dedication page.
  4. Preview & Edit: Review the AI-generated book and make any changes to text or request illustration regeneration if needed.
  5. Order: Choose between digital PDF or printed hardcover book delivery.

The entire process typically takes 5-10 minutes, and you'll see a preview before finalizing your order.

faqs.question: How do I upload photos and what quality is needed?
faqs.answer:
To get the best AI-generated character results, follow these photo guidelines:

Photo Requirements:

  • Resolution: Minimum 1024x1024 pixels (higher is better)
  • Format: JPG or PNG files
  • Face Visibility: Child's face should be clearly visible and facing forward
  • Lighting: Well-lit photos with natural lighting work best
  • Background: Simple, uncluttered backgrounds help the AI focus on the face
  • Single Subject: One child per photo (no group photos)

Tips for Best Results:

  • Use recent photos taken in good lighting
  • Avoid blurry, dark, or heavily filtered images
  • Photos taken outdoors in natural light often work best
  • Make sure the child's eyes are open and face is not obscured

Photo Rights & Consent:

  • You must have rights to use the uploaded photos
  • Obtain consent from persons depicted in photos
  • For minors: parental/guardian consent required
  • Do not upload photos of famous characters or copyrighted content

You can upload multiple photos and choose the one that generates the best character representation.

faqs.question: Can I customize the story, text, and illustrations?
faqs.answer:
Yes! We offer extensive customization options:

Text Customization:

  • Edit any text in the story to personalize it further
  • Modify character names and details
  • Add or change the dedication message
  • Adjust story elements to fit your child's preferences

Illustration Options:

  • Request regeneration of specific illustrations if you're not satisfied
  • Choose from different art styles (depending on story theme)
  • Preview all changes before ordering

Character Customization:

  • Child's name appears throughout the story
  • AI generates character based on uploaded photo
  • Consistent character appearance across all pages

All customization happens in the preview stage before you place your order, so you can perfect the book exactly how you want it.

faqs.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the AI-generated results?
faqs.answer:
We're committed to your satisfaction, and we provide several safeguards:

Preview Before Ordering:

You can review and edit the entire book before placing your order. This ensures you're completely happy with the result.

Regeneration Options:

  • Request new illustrations if the AI doesn't capture your child's likeness well
  • Edit text to better fit your preferences
  • Try different photos for better character generation
  • No additional cost for regeneration during the creation process

AI Quality Disclaimer:

Our AI technology creates unique, personalized books, but results may vary based on photo quality and complexity. Minor artistic variations are normal and part of the AI's creative interpretation. AI-generated content is provided 'as is' without guarantees of perfection.

How We Use Your Photos:

  • Photos analyzed by AI solely to generate character illustrations
  • NOT used to train AI models
  • NOT shared with third parties (except AI service provider under strict agreement)
  • Automatically deleted after 30 days (shorter than industry standard)

What Qualifies as a Defect:

  • Printing errors or physical damage
  • Missing pages or incorrect binding
  • Significant deviation from approved preview
  • Books damaged during shipping

What's NOT Considered a Defect:

  • Minor artistic variations in AI-generated illustrations
  • Slight color differences from digital preview (normal in printing)
  • Personal preference differences in art style
  • AI interpretation of facial features

If you receive a defective book, we offer a full refund or replacement within 14 days of delivery.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation and refund policy?
faqs.answer:
We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. Here's our cancellation policy:

Cancellation Window:

  • Before Production: Full refund if cancelled within 48 hours of order placement and before printing begins
  • During Production: Cannot cancel once book enters printing (typically 48 hours after order)
  • After Shipping: Cannot cancel, but return policy applies for defective books

How to Cancel:

  1. Email support@kidbookcreator.com with your order number
  2. We'll confirm if your order is eligible for cancellation
  3. Refund processed within 5-7 business days to original payment method

Personalized Product Notice:

As personalized products are made specifically for you, they cannot be cancelled once production begins. This is standard industry practice and complies with consumer protection laws:

  • EU: Consumer Rights Directive Article 16(c) - Personalized goods excluded from right of withdrawal
  • UK: Consumer Contracts Regulations 2013
  • US: State-specific consumer protection laws

Digital E-Books:

  • Cannot be cancelled once generation starts
  • Not eligible for refund after download
  • Preview carefully before finalizing order

Exceptions:

  • Defective or damaged books can be returned for full refund (see Return Policy)
  • Significant production errors qualify for refund or replacement
  • Force majeure events (delivery failures beyond our control)

Our Commitment:

We offer a longer 48-hour cancellation window compared to the industry standard 24 hours. We'll always work with you to find a fair solution if issues arise.

faqs.question: What is your return policy for defective books?
faqs.answer:

  • Condition: Book must be in original condition (unread or gently read)
  • Proof Required: Clear photos of the defect must be provided
  • Inspection: Inspect your book immediately upon delivery

What Qualifies as Defective:

  • Printing errors: Blurry images, color issues, text errors
  • Physical damage: Torn pages, broken binding, damaged cover
  • Missing pages or incorrect page order
  • Significant deviation from approved preview
  • Shipping damage: Books damaged during transit
  • Production errors: Wrong personalization, incorrect content

What's NOT Considered Defective:

  • Minor color variations from digital preview (normal in printing)
  • AI artistic interpretation differences
  • Personal preference regarding art style
  • Minor imperfections in AI-generated illustrations
  • Slight paper texture variations
  • Normal wear from reading

Return Process:

  1. Contact support@kidbookcreator.com within 14 days with:
    • Order number
    • Clear photos showing the defect
    • Description of the issue
  2. We'll review and approve your return within 24-48 hours
  3. We provide a prepaid return shipping label (free for defects)
  4. Choose between full refund or replacement book
  5. Refund processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the return

Liability Limitation:

Our liability is limited to the purchase price of the book. We are not liable for indirect, consequential, or special damages.

Our Guarantee:

faqs.question: How do you protect my personal data and photos?
faqs.answer:
We take your privacy and data security very seriously and comply with all major data protection regulations:

Data We Collect:

  • Personal Information: Name, email, shipping/billing address
  • Payment Data: Processed by third-party providers (Stripe) - we never store card details
  • Photos: Images uploaded for book creation only
  • Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device info (automatic)
  • Usage Data: Pages visited, clicks, session duration (analytics)

Photo Storage & Deletion:

  • Storage Duration: Photos stored for 30 days after order completion (shorter than industry standard of 90 days)
  • Automatic Deletion: Photos automatically and permanently deleted after 30 days
  • Early Deletion: Request immediate deletion by contacting support
  • Secure Storage: All photos encrypted (SSL/TLS) and stored on secure servers
  • AI Processing: Photos analyzed by AI solely for illustration generation
  • NOT used to train AI models
  • NOT shared with third parties (except AI provider under strict data processing agreement)

Legal Basis for Processing (GDPR):

  • Performance of Contract: Order processing, delivery, customer service
  • Legitimate Interest: Fraud prevention, security, site improvement
  • Consent: Marketing communications, non-essential cookies
  • Legal Obligation: Tax records (7 years), legal compliance

Data Protection Compliance:

  • GDPR Compliant: Full compliance with EU General Data Protection Regulation
  • CCPA Compliant: California Consumer Privacy Act compliance
  • COPPA Compliant: Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (US)
  • No Data Sales: We never sell or rent your personal data
  • Third-Party Processors: All bound by data processing agreements
  • International Transfers: Standard Contractual Clauses for non-EU transfers

Your Rights (GDPR/CCPA):

  • Right to Access: Request a copy of your personal data
  • Right to Rectification: Correct inaccurate data
  • Right to Erasure: Request deletion of your data (with legal exceptions)
  • Right to Restriction: Limit how we process your data
  • Right to Data Portability: Receive data in machine-readable format
  • Right to Object: Opt out of processing for marketing
  • Right to Withdraw Consent: Unsubscribe anytime
  • Right to Lodge Complaint: File complaint with supervisory authority

How to Exercise Your Rights:

Email privacy@kidbookcreator.com with your request. We'll respond within 30 days (GDPR) or 45 days (CCPA). Identity verification may be required.

Security Measures:

  • SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmission
  • Encrypted database storage
  • Access controls: Role-based employee access
  • Regular security audits and penetration testing
  • Data breach notification: Within 72 hours to authorities (GDPR)
  • PCI-DSS compliant payment processing

Cookies:

  • Essential cookies: Required for site functionality (no consent needed)
  • Analytics cookies: Google Analytics (consent required)
  • Marketing cookies: Advertising (consent required)
  • Manage cookie preferences via our cookie banner

Children's Privacy:

  • Service intended for adults (parents/guardians) to create books for children
  • We do not knowingly collect data from children under 16 (EU) or 13 (US)
  • If discovered, data deleted immediately
  • Parents can request deletion of child data

Data Retention:

  • Account data: While account active + reasonable period after closure
  • Order/invoice data: 7 years (tax/legal requirement)
  • Photos: 30 days, then automatic deletion
  • Marketing data: Until consent withdrawn

For complete details, please review our Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, and Cookie Policy.
